comments:
Build ID: I20070209-1006

Steps To Reproduce:
Unfortunately, I can't reproduce the error. I had the cursor on a class name and pressed Alt+Shift+R. I started changing the name and suddenly, the 'Refactor' and 'Preview...' in the hover where disabled. I clicked somewhere else to make the hover disappear but it kept reappearing as soon as the mouse went over the class name again. I then choose 'Open Dialog...' which didn't work as well. This produced the stacktraces below:

The exception is thrown because not all linked positions have the same contents. I don't see how this could happen, and without steps to reproduce, we'll probably never find out.

Moving to Platform/Text to improve the exception message, so that we have better chances to find out what's wrong if this happens again.

Improve exception message
